power.title: Cacophonous Shout
power.fluff: You summon a wall of sound that slams into your foes like a battering ram

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 3 squares to the nearest unoccupied space outside the blast. The target is deafened until the end of the encounter.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

power.title: Cyclone Scourge
power.fluff: You leap into the air, gathering winds to help you smash your enemy and trap it in a swirling column of destruction

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You fly up to your speed to a space adjacent to an enemy.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The blast creates a zone of howling winds until the end of your next turn.
While the zone persists, you can use the following actions:

section.name: Move Action:
section.text: You move the zone up to 3 squares.

section.name: Free Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: A creature other than you enters the zone; You slide the triggering creature up to 2 squares. You can use this action only once per turn.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Harmonious Thunder
power.fluff: You punch one foe then spin and deliver a kick to another as thunder rumbles in the distance, rolling closer with your strikes and exploding between your two foes

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier thunder damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you targeted two creatures, both targets are in harmonious resonance until the end of the encounter or until either target is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer.

While they are resonant, the first time each turn that one target takes damage, the other takes thunder damage after the damaging effect has been resolved. The thunder damage equals your Strength modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Lashing Rain
power.fluff: Your savage strike draws an enemy close, leaving you in an aggressive stance that lets you punish any foe that approaches you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares to a square adjacent to you.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Lashing Rain stance.
Until the stance ends, you are slowed and can use the following action once per turn. You must be able to take opportunity actions to take this action.

section.name: Free Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: An enemy you can see enters a square adjacent to you; The triggering enemy takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and slide it 2 squares to a square adjacent to you.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can end this stance as a free action on your turn, but not on the same turn that you activated it.

power.title: Masterful Spiral
power.fluff: With a sudden burst of motion, you deliver crushing kicks and punches of psionic force to nearby enemies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier force damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Spiral stance.
Until the stance ends, your reach with melee touch attacks increases by 1.

power.title: Reflection in Water
power.fluff: Fixing your attention on a single opponent lets you mirror its movements with swift strikes and counterstrikes

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Reflection in Water stance.
Until the stance ends, you gain combat advantage against any enemy adjacent to at least one of your allies. You can also use the following action:

section.name: Opportunity Reaction:
section.text: Trigger: An enemy adjacent to you misses you with an attack; You swap places with the triggering enemy. This counts as a shift for you, and a slide for the enemy.

power.title: Risen Sun
power.fluff: Your wrath ignites your thoughts and causes them to erupt into liquid flames that rush out and incinerate anything near you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

section.name: Each Failed Saving Throw:
section.text: You can slide the target 1 square. This does not count as an action.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 1 (Fire, Implement, Psionic) that lasts until the end of your next turn.
Any enemy that enters the aura or ends its turn there takes fire damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

power.title: Spinning Leopard Maneuver
power.fluff: Maintaining perfect balance, you weave a deadly path through the fray, dealing kicks and punches to each foe you pass

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to your speed.
You make the following attack once against each enemy that you move adjacent to during the shift:

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Steel Avalanche
power.fluff: You unleash a wave of psionic power that cuts through your foes like steel

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 4 squares to a square adjacent to the blast.

power.title: Stunning Palm
power.fluff: Your psionic energy keeps you focused in combat, and can be released in a stunning blow that knocks a foe senseless

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Stunning Palm stance.
Until the stance ends, you cannot be dazed or stunned, and you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with your Monk attacks that daze or stun.
Also, you can use the Stunning Palm Strike attack once while you are in the stance.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The Stunning Palm stance ends.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2 + your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.

power.title: Whirling Mantis Step
power.fluff: With swift steps and overwhelming leverage, you shove aside your foes and cripple them with vicious kicks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to your speed.
If you enter a square adjacent to an enemy during this shift, you slide that enemy 1 square. You can slide a given enemy only once during the shift.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
